alert.note: Alert for Blaine; Custer; Loup (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 11 at 9:51PM CDT until July 11 at 10:30PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Loup County in north central Nebraska... Northeastern Custer County in central Nebraska... Southeastern Blaine County in north central Nebraska... * Until 1030 PM CDT. * At 951 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles south of Brewster, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Sargent, Merna, Anselmo, Victoria Springs State Recreation Area, Lillian, Milburn, Milburn Diversion Dam State Wildlife Management Area, Round Valley, Walworth and Gates. This includes the following highways... Highway 183 between mile markers 113 and 114. Highway 2 between mile markers 252 and 273. Highway 92 between mile markers 272 and 273. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
